motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4, ease: [0.22, 1, 0.36, 1] }}

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid warm colors or subtle noise textures.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA standards).
Use 'DM Serif Display' ONLY for H1 and H2. Use 'Manrope' for everything else.
Interactive elements must have a 'data-testid' attribute.
For the Chat Interface, use 'react-markdown' with 'remark-gfm' to render the Cursor-style formatting.
Contract Analysis reports must use the 'risk_levels' color coding for visual scanning.
NO BLUE or GREEN in the main UI chrome (except for specific 'Safe' risk indicators in the report).
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the provided colors and font families. 2. Add the Google Fonts import to 'index.css'. 3. Create a 'Layout' component that enforces the max-width and background color. 4. Build the 'Home' page using the 'Tetris Grid' layout. 5. Implement the Chat interface with Markdown support. 6. Ensure the 'Contract Analysis' page uses the split-screen layout.
